definition: increasingly/more and more/ever more/all the more
generic word for peoples or states of south China or south Asia at different historical periods/abbr. for Vietnam 越南
to exceed/to climb over/to surpass/the more... the more
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: When Chou Chin heard Chin You-yu telling his sad story, he cried even harder.
sentences.chinese: 周進見姊夫說中他的心事，越發號啕大哭。

sentences.english: Hoary Mount Tai looked more precipitous.
sentences.chinese: 古老的泰山越發顯得崔嵬了。

sentences.english: The plants of courtyard appears to be more vigorous in hazy rain.
sentences.chinese: 院子的植物也因爲下雨的關係，越發顯得蔥翠。

sentences.english: Late at night she walked alone in the street, appearing even more lonely and solitary.
sentences.chinese: 深夜，她一個人走在街頭，越發顯得身單影孤。

sentences.english: but abounds also through many givings of thanks to God;
sentences.chinese: 而且叫許多人越發感謝神。

sentences.english: The churches were strengthened in the faith, and they increased in numbers daily.
sentences.chinese: 於是衆教會信心越發堅固，人數天天增加。

sentences.english: Ooh, the more I get of you, stranger it feels, yeah.
sentences.chinese: 噢，獲得越多，感覺越發奇麗，是的。

sentences.english: This to secretary's reception work even more unimportance.
sentences.chinese: 這對祕書的接待工作越發的重要。

sentences.english: But climate modelers themselves have grown increasingly pessimistic.
sentences.chinese: 但氣候模式本身確實變得越發令人悲觀。

sentences.english: With an odd number of cuts, things start to get more complicated.
sentences.chinese: 要是刀數爲奇數，題目變得越發龐年夜。
古老的泰山越發顯得崔嵬了。

sentences.english: Service has got slower, waiting times longer.
sentences.chinese: 審判工作越發緩慢，原被告雙方等待時間也更漫長。

sentences.english: As the week rolls on, you'll find the energy shifts into a more social & uplifting energy...
sentences.chinese: 這星期，你的星運適合社交活動方面，越發振奮。

sentences.english: The wine sparkled in his eyes and the bells jingled.
sentences.chinese: 酒在他的眼睛裏閃耀，那些戲鈴越發丁零當郎。

sentences.english: That changes and as people's concept of time becomes more sophisticated, so does the quality of their coping," Thurber said.
sentences.chinese: 那樣的變化與人們的時間觀念一樣，變得越發的老練。

sentences.english: Immediate cuts would be iniquitous and punish their poor.
sentences.chinese: 要求他們馬上削減是不公平的並且會讓他們越發貧窮。

definition: to feel/to sense/to detect/to perceive/to become aware
to become aware/to detect/to realize/to perceive
to see with one's own eyes/very soon
